steps.description: The K9 glass substrate was cleaned using an acid solution.

Photonic crystals consisting of 10 unit cells were fabricated on the cleaned K9 glass substrate. Each unit cell has 4 layers: HfO2 (first and third layers) with refractive index 2.00, and SiO2 (second and fourth layers) with refractive index 1.45. The thickness of each layer is defined by parameters p and q, where d_a1 = (l + p) * d_a, d_b1 = (l + q) * d_b, d_a2 = (l - p) * d_a, d_b2 = (l - q) * d_b. The fixed parameters were d_a = 0.323 um and d_b = 0.240 um. The thickness uncertainty of each layer was below 10nm.
A silver film was fabricated on the photonic crystals for experimental verification.

synthesis.notes: The parameters p and q belong to [-1,1]. For the 4 PCs used in Fig. 4b, the specific thickness parameters (p,q) were: (0.50, 0.26), (0.56, 0.30), (0.70, 0.38), and (0.78, 0.36). The silver film thickness was controlled at about 20nm.
